title: Algorithm Meta-Parameters
technique_description: Reconstruct trigger via gradient descent, test on additional images, collect misclassification and evasion statistics

num_examples.description: Number of example images to use during feature generation

max_iter.description: Maximum number of steps of gradient descent

add_delta.description: If 1, trigger is made by adding a delta instead of replacing pixels

object_threshold.description: Confidence threshold for whether an object was detected

trigger_size.description: Size of pixel patch / trigger (l x l)

find_label_dist.description: Minimum distance between detected object and ground truth source object to assume the model has misclassified the source object (for determining target class)

misclassification_dist.description: Minimum distance between detected object and ground truth source object to assume the model has misclassified the source object (for determining whether trigger is valid)

feature_dist.description: Minimum distance between detected object and ground truth source object to assume the model has misclassified the source object (for generating misclassifacation/evasion statistics)
